member.summary: Contains type metadata.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Razor.Runtime.TagHelpers.ITypeInfo.FullName
member.summary: Fully qualified name of the type.
member.remarks: On CoreCLR, some BCL types get type forwarded to the full desktop framework implementations at runtime. For e.g. we compile against System.String in System.Runtime which is type forwarded to mscorlib at runtime. Consequently for generic types where the includes the assembly qualified name of generic parameters, FullNames would not match. Use to compare s instead.

member.summary: Gets s for all properties of the current type excluding indexers.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Razor.TagHelpers.HtmlTargetElementAttribute.TagStructure
member.summary: The expected tag structure. Defaults to .
member.remarks:
If and no other tag helpers applying to the same element specify their the behavior is used:
<my-tag-helper></my-tag-helper> <!-- OR --> <my-tag-helper />
Otherwise, if another tag helper applying to the same element does specify their behavior, that behavior is used.
If HTML elements can be written in the following formats:
<my-tag-helper> <!-- OR --> <my-tag-helper />
